item.title: literature note on Hayek1945
item.description: The Use of Knowledge in Society by Hayek F.A. (1945) The American Economic Review 35: 519–530 Reference: Hayek1945 Hayek’s contribution is identifying the mechanism of the market system Briefly, we sketch the essence of a market organization.
